AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drugmaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to refine raw ingredients into... "candy". [PAWN_pronoun] became an adept at rolling joints quickly, and [PAWN_pronoun] received an award named "Fastest Roller in the Rim" for [PAWN_possessive] skill.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Choir member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned at an early age to a junior troupe that sang a tune whenever something traumatic or disfiguring occurred to someone. So many incidents occurred at such a rapid rate that AWN_pronoun] became quite fleet footed. [PAWN_pronoun] also became good at punching, kicking, and even shooting anyone that happened to get in the way of the choir. In [PAWN_possessive] free time, [PAWN_nameDef] dabbled in horticulture and made artisan bread.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Larborer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to labor in the mines to harvest raw resources to be used in candy manufacturing equipment. When [PAWN_pronoun] managed to fulfill [PAWN_possessive] quota, [PAWN_pronoun] was sent to the farms to tend plants and livestock.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered a passion for deconstructing and reconstructing old gadgets and whirligigs in the storage closet. I mean, [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't good at it. But [PAWN_pronoun] liked it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lab assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an assistant in a Oompa Loompa food testing facility. For whatever reason, that meant handling highly caustic chemicals all the time. [PAWN_nameDef] got many chemical burns. So, so many chemical burns. In fact, [PAWN_pronoun] got so many that [PAWN_possessive] skin was just a wrinkly, leathery hide. Of course, this doesn't do [PAWN_objective] any favors in the looks department.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a typical and boring childhood. Most days during growing season, [PAWN_pronoun] helped tend the psychoid fields with other Oompa Loompas. After harvest day, [PAWN_pronoun] went to school and learned about various topics, from go-juice production to flake manufacturing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Packaged One
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was working in a packaging facility one day, when [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally fell onto a conveyor belt. No one rescued [PAWN_objective] because the facility managers were too busy singing while a tourist got their hand stuck in a pulverizer. [PAWN_pronoun] was shoved into a cardboard box and shipped off to a random pirate settlement. The pirates who found [PAWN_nameDef] decided to raise [PAWN_objective] and teach [PAWN_objective] combat skills for around 5 years, before eventually returning [PAWN_objective] at the ripe old age of 12.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Former pyromaniac
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a normal Oompa Loompa, rolling joints and practicing [PAWN_pronoun] singing when visitors would receive minor injuries like stubbed toes. But then [PAWN_pronoun] obtained the most deadly of addictions: pyromania. [PAWN_nameDef] set fire to everything for weeks until [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally set a drug stockpile on fire. The trauma of burning that many drugs was so great, [PAWN_pronoun] swore off ever touching fire again. [PAWN_pronoun] was still punished by being forced to rebuild everything [PAWN_pronoun] damaged.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manager's kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of one of the factory managers. [PAWN_pronoun] never did any difficult work and enjoyed a privileged upbringing. [PAWN_pronoun] was generally insufferable and a pain to be around, so much so that no one wanted to even bother sucking up to [PAWN_objective]. Nobody likes a [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Visionary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was really bored one day, so [PAWN_pronoun] decided to combine yayo, wake-up, and go-juice, and then mixed it with ambrosia nectar. [PAWN_pronoun] offered it to his friend, who loved it and talked about it to everyone who would listen. This made [PAWN_nameDef] very popular, and [PAWN_nameDef] was lauded as a genius. That is, until [PAWN_possessive] friend developed numerous amounts of visible tumors on his body. [PAWN_nameDef] was still respected for [PAWN_possessive] creativity however.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Employee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was just a normal employee, working a normal 9 to 5 job, working in plantations, making various drugs, and hauling volatile chemicals around that could cause catastrophic injury, all while being provided little to no health insurance.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a general maintenance technician for the factory [PAWN_pronoun] worked in. [PAWN_pronoun] was in charge of keeping the machines in the factory running, and [PAWN_pronoun] was fairly good at it. [PAWN_pronoun] favorite part of the job was removing the various amputated appendages that got caught in the machinery.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gastronomist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the master chefs of the factory [PAWN_pronoun] worked in [PAWN_possessive] kitchen, preparing delicacies with a trained eye and a steady hand. [PAWN_pronoun] also knew how much of a drug [PAWN_pronoun] should add to a given amount of food to elicit a strong reaction without using too much of the drug. [PAWN_nameDef] did gain a disdain for cleaning [PAWN_possessive] workstation, much to the annoyance of the cleaners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lab Technician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lab technician working in a Research and Development facility, dedicated to optimizing production rates and making products as cheap as possible while still maintaining some semblance of quality. In addition to being well versed in the sciences, [PAWN_nameDef] was also adept in capturing test subjects when [PAWN_pronoun] ran out of people that got caught in trash chutes or other heavy machinery.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Journeying Chorister
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] joined an official troupe to sing at people's misfortune no matter where their location. If a caravan's trader had their leg chopped off by a raider, [PAWN_nameDef] was there to sing about their misfortunes. When someone slipped on the varnished floor in their room at midnight, [PAWN_nameDef] would barrel through the victim's door and wax poetic about what moral could be learned from this situation. [PAWN_nameDef] had to develop combat skills due to being accosted by bandits often.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] herded the livestock of the local factory. [PAWN_pronoun] had to harvest and haul hay, handle and train livestock, and harvest various animal products. [PAWN_possessive] job also involved butchering various corpses and turning the meat into feed for animals. Oompa Loompas constantly singing instead of giving medical care to victims meant that [PAWN_possessive] services were often needed.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a manager handling the drug production of [PAWN_possessive] boss's factory. [PAWN_possessive] duties entailed overseeing drug production, inspect crop farming techniques, and making sure nothing exploded. [PAWN_nameDef] was a harsh manager, and was reviled by [PAWN_possessive] subordinates due to being generally unlikeable.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Intern
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned the dirty work in the factory, from cleaning the toilets, to hauling papers around, to delivering tea to anyone who outranked him. [PAWN_nameDef] was dissatisfied with [PAWN_possessive] lot in life, but [PAWN_possessive] didn't care enough to do anything about it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a doctor. Okay, well [PAWN_pronoun] never actually got a degree. In fact, [PAWN_pronoun] never actually went to a medical school at all. The only practical experience that [PAWN_pronoun] had was putting bandages over minor cuts. Fortunately, [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for harvesting organs from anyone who vandalized the factory [PAWN_pronoun] worked in. So [PAWN_pronoun] managed to snag an official job.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Salesman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] doled out the products of the Oompa Loompas. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't actually know how to "wheel and deal," so [PAWN_pronoun] just gave the stuff away. Fortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't disciplined that much, so [PAWN_possessive] job was safe. [PAWN_pronoun] was regulated to drug production after [PAWN_pronoun] lost 2000 kilograms of yayo.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Accountant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] dealt with the finances for the factory [PAWN_pronoun] worked in. From what [PAWN_nameDef] could tell, the factory should have been in crippling debt due to how dealers kept on practically giving away their products for cheap and how everyone kept suing them for criminal negligence. But to [PAWN_possessive] surprise, the factory was well into the green, and the lawsuits seemed to magically disappear after enough time passed. [PAWN_nameDef] wanted to dive deeper, but considered the high turnover [PAWN_possessive] job had and decided against angering a high-ranking executive. Or maybe the high turnover was due to accountants being sent out in raiding parties for some reason.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fallen Executive
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the executives in the factory. Unfortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun] lost a shipment of drugs [PAWN_pronoun] was overseeing. Even though it didn't really matter since it wasn't a large shipment and it really wasn't [PAWN_nameDef]'s fault, [PAWN_pronoun] had enough enemies to have them convince the higher ups to demote [PAWN_objective] to field work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Executive
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The title of executive is not an easy feat to accomplish. It requires hard work, dedication, and while technically unofficial, committing an act that contains the quintessence of an Oompa Loompa is seen as vital for the job. [PAWN_nameDef] earned this position by singing about greed while a group of children touring a factory fell into an industrial roller designed to flatten candy into razor thin sheets. Even the most hardened of Oompa Loompas were mildly disgusted by this, and thus [PAWN_nameDef] was their first choice for promotion.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Executive
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The title of executive is not an easy feat to accomplish. It requires hard work, dedication, and while technically unofficial, committing an act that contains the quintessence of an Oompa Loompa is seen as vital for the job. [PAWN_nameDef] earned this by breaking records in drug production and drug sales, accomplished by making them while riding on a pack muffalo. Most Oompa Loompas were impressed by this feat, and thus [PAWN_nameDef] was their first choice for promotion.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Insane Executive
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The title of executive is not an easy feat to accomplish. It requires hard work, dedication, and while technically unofficial, committing an act that contains the quintessence of an Oompa Loompa is seen as vital for the job. [PAWN_nameDef] earned this by being especially cruel and unhinged in [PAWN_possessive] managing methods. When [PAWN_possessive]'s subordinates didn't; t reach their quota one time. [PAWN_nameDef] removed all the tables in the cafeteria for two years. It is estimated that 57 casualties occurred due to the incident known as the "Tablecalypse." Most Oompa Loompas were horrified by this and called for [PAWN_nameDef]'s blood, but [PAWN_pronoun] technically fit the bill, so [PAWN_pronoun] got the job with ease.
